## ClassifiedChange interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An API change with its release type classification. This is the output of applying a policy to an ApiChange.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ClassifiedChange extends ApiChange 
```
**Extends:** [ApiChange](./change-detector-core.apichange.md)
